creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: image of an empty wine glass standing on small, heavily shaded plate with scalloped edge
inscription:
Signature

-- in graphite on recto, at bottom: [2 5/8 x 3 3/4] | #81 | [10 5/8 x 13 1/4] | G-2723
-- in graphite on verso: APG 8138 | 42099
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York; sold February 13, 1986, to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: The Wine Glass
